channel.title: 562 Server sudden issue!
channel.description:
[size=36pt]++REP for ANSWER[/size]
I have this issue I just compiled I don't know what I did wrong so If you guys could help that would be great! [code]Preparing... A subdirectory or file bin already exists. The system cannot find the file specified. The system cannot find the file specified. Compiling core... completed... running server... [2011/04/11 20:35:32] [Fatality]: rs2hd framework [2011/04/11 20:35:32] [Fatality]: Loading Clans... [2011/04/11 20:35:34] [Fatality]: Loaded 1 clans. [2011/04/11 20:35:35] [Fatality]: Loaded 15500item prices. [ loaded LightPkz 562 BETA Shops ] Exception in thread "Fatality" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError at com.rs2hd.Server.<init>(Server.java:75) at com.rs2hd.Main$1.run(Main.java:35) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException at com.rs2hd.model.NoclipHandler.<init>(NoclipHandler.java:86) at com.rs2hd.GameEngine.<clinit>(GameEngine.java:103) ... 3 more[/code]

Sorry then xP, just trying too help point you into a direction… anyways just noticed it was an exception… do you have msn? It’d be faster too chat through there ;/.

item.title: 562 Server sudden issue!
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

It can’t be I never touched Server.java
/**
* We do a major update every 600ms.
*/
private static final long MAJOR_UPDATE_TIME = 600;

/**
 * We do a minor update every 100ms.
 */
private static final long MINOR_UPDATE_TIME = 100;

/**
 * We do a gc update every second.
 */
private static final long GC_UPDATE_TIME = 1000;

/**
 * Acceptor.
 */
private IoAcceptor acceptor;

/**
 * Connection handler.
 */
private ConnectionHandler connectionHandler;

/**
 * Connection throttle filter.
 */
private ConnectionThrottleFilter throttleFilter;

/**
 * Create this server.
 * @throws Exception

thats like 75 plus a few

Read full topic

item.title: 562 Server sudden issue!
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

Open you server.java file, and type “ctrl + g” if you are using notepad or notepad ++, head too line 75, as that’s your first error, and sometimes that can cause more errors. If doesn’t help, just reply…

Read full topic
